categories: Category:Battles in the Allied Tion sector

nodes.text: Sometime between 3973 BBY and 3965 BBY, during the early years of the conflict known as the Mandalorian Wars between the Galactic Republic and the Mandalorian Neo-Crusaders, a battle was fought in 3963 BBY in the Jaminere star system. Occurring after the Mandalorians conquered the Lianna system then split their forces between their attack on the Makem system and another against Jaminere, the battle in the Jaminere system ended in a Galactic Republic defeat. Following the engagement, the Mandalorians raided the Sy Myrth system.

The battle in the Jaminere system was referenced in 2009's The Essential Atlas, which was written by Daniel Wallace and Jason Fry. The battle was only marked on the galaxy-wide map of the Mandalorian Wars instead of being described in prose.
